content: President Bannon will be releasing Executive Orders on this issue in his next EO flurry. If you haven’t researched Bannon you should. His stated views on White Nationalism, Christian Secular Government, anti-Muslim, and Military Domination of the world is incomparable to anyone I have ever researched. Bannon now has more power over a presidency than Cheney ever had over Bush, and we all should be very afraid.
